feed.title: qBitController Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v1.0.0
entry.content:
• Updated to Material Design 3 and added Material You support
  • Added confirmation dialog for torrent force recheck
  • Removed the hide loading bar option; it's now enabled by default
  • Fixed incorrect torrent progress bar colors
  • RSS feeds are now displayed in a tree view
  • Fixed "Mark as Read" not working in certain RSS scenarios
  • Added DNS over HTTPS support
  • Added ability to select multiple files while adding torrents
  • Many minor changes and fixes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Bartuzen/qBitController/compare/v0.8.5...v1.0.0

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v1.1.0
entry.content:
• Added option to set default torrent status filter
  • Torrent details now display private status
  • Fixed issues with qBittorrent 5.0.0
  • Fixed torrent list refreshing not working after process death
  • Fixed minor issues

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Bartuzen/qBitController/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v1.1.1
entry.content:
• Made changes to notification system
  • Added placeholders to display when the torrent list is empty
  • Added popularity and availability metrics for torrents
  • Added ability to modify RSS feed URLs
  • Improved searching
  • Bug fixes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Bartuzen/qBitController/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v2.0.0
entry.content:
• Completely redesigned and updated user interface
  • Added support for iOS and desktop
  • Bug fixes

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v2.0.1
